name: CommercialTrends
0:
”Alexa, launch Commercial Trends”
”Alexa, ask Commercial Trends play innovation podcasts”
”Alexa, ask Commercial Trends play random podcast”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: commercial trends
des: Capital One Commercial Banking has embraced "Change Banking For Good" by providing discussions with industry leaders on relevant topics in commercial banking. The topics include insights and news in commercial real estate, middle markets, treasury management and other important areas in today's competitive landscape. First developed for website reading, Capital One now introduces podcast versions of some of these wonderful discussions for your enjoyment. They are thought-provoking and conversation starters for the uninitiated as well as the well-versed commercial banking listeners.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
